#id=1
#text=The Flat Tire It was a beautiful sunny day with only a slight breeze .
#id=2
#text=It seemed to me like a perfect day for a bicycle ride .
#id=3
#text=I thought I would ride on the bike trails to the park and enjoy my day .
#id=4
#text=However , when I went out into the garage , I saw that the back tire on my bicycle was flat .
#id=5
#text=Luckily , I had a spare tire on hand .
#id=6
#text=The tire that was flat had been on my bicycle for a couple of years now , it needed replaced anyway .
#id=7
#text=I remembered how my dad had taught me to replace the tire and got the job done .
#id=8
#text=It did not take as long as I thought it might .
#id=9
#text=I kept the old tire to see if I could patch it up later and put air in it to have on hand as a spare when I needed one .
#text=After my new tire was on my bike , I went for the ride to the park that I planned and had a great time .
